N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 483.3 - Records, unloaded weight method

State Regulations

Every carrier electing to report under the unloaded
weight method (see sections
481.9
-481.10, supra) must maintain daily mileage records for each truck having an
unloaded weight in excess of 8,000 pounds and for each tractor having an
unloaded weight in excess of 4,000 pounds which is operated in this State. Such
carrier is not required to maintain records of the operation of any truck
having an unloaded weight of 8,000 pounds or less, of any tractor having an
unloaded weight of 4,000 pounds or less, or of any trailer, even though highway
use permits were obtained for such motor vehicles solely because of their
maximum gross weights. Notes
